description: A user mistakenly submitted a claim and wants to cancel it, then start a new claim with corrected information. The assistant retrieves the original claim status, fetches the policy, processes new photos, builds a corrected claim form, predicts approval likelihood, and submits the new claim while arranging cancellation of the original claim.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI-driven Insurance Claim Assistant. Help users manage their claims by retrieving policies, extracting information from images, populating claim forms, predicting approval chances, and submitting claims through the insurer's API. Use the provided tools as needed.

I accidentally submitted a claim yesterday (claim ID C12345) with the wrong photos and description. I need to cancel that claim and file a new one with the correct info. My policy number is POL-987654. Here are the correct photos: https://example.com/photo1.jpg and https://example.com/photo2.jpg. The incident happened on 2025-11-20 at 123 Maple St. The damage is a cracked windshield and a dented front bumper. Estimated repair cost is $2,300.

Got it. I’ll first check the status of the claim you want to cancel (C12345) and then retrieve your policy details. After that, I’ll extract the needed information from the new photos you provided and prepare a corrected claim for you.
{"claim_id":"C12345","status":"Submitted","submission_date":"2025-11-26","policy_number":"POL-987654"}

{"policy_number":"POL-987654","holder_name":"Jane Doe","effective_date":"2024-01-01","expiration_date":"2025-12-31","coverage":{"collision":true,"comprehensive":true,"deductible":500},"contact":"jane.doe@email.com"}

Your claim C12345 is currently **Submitted** and still pending review, so we can request a cancellation. I’ve also pulled your policy (POL-987654). Next, I’ll extract the relevant details from the new photos you shared.
Running OCR on the first photo…
{"text":"Cracked windshield front left corner. Visible spider cracks. Estimated cost $1,500.","key_value_pairs":{"damage_type":"windshield","severity":"crack","estimated_cost":"1500"}}
Running OCR on the second photo…
{"text":"Front bumper dented on right side. Minor paint scratch. Estimated cost $800.","key_value_pairs":{"damage_type":"bumper","severity":"dent","estimated_cost":"800"}}

Thanks. I’ve extracted the damage details from both photos. Here’s the structured incident information I’ll use for the new claim:
- **Date:** 2025-11-20
- **Location:** 123 Maple St
- **Damages:**
  - Windshield (crack) – $1,500
  - Front bumper (dent) – $800
- **Total estimated cost:** $2,300
- **Description:** Cracked windshield and dented front bumper as captured in the provided photos.

Now I’ll populate the claim form with this incident data and your policy information.

incident_details.description: Cracked windshield and dented front bumper as captured in the provided photos.

messages.content: {"claim_form":{"policy_number":"POL-987654","holder_name":"Jane Doe","incident_date":"2025-11-20","incident_location":"123 Maple St","incident_description":"Cracked windshield and dented front bumper as captured in the provided photos.","damages":[{"type":"windshield","severity":"crack","estimated_cost":1500},{"type":"front bumper","severity":"dent","estimated_cost":800}],"total_estimated_cost":2300,"deductible":500}}
I’ve built the corrected claim form. Let me run a quick approval‑likelihood prediction so you know how it looks before we submit.

claim_form.incident_description: Cracked windshield and dented front bumper as captured in the provided photos.

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.87,"risk_factors":["deductible higher than $500","damage on windshield may require glass specialist"]}

The model estimates an **87%** chance of approval. The main risk factors are the $500 deductible and the need for a specialist to replace the windshield. Would you like me to go ahead and submit this corrected claim and also request cancellation of the original claim C12345?
Yes, please submit the new claim and cancel the old one.
Submitting the new claim now…

claim_form.incident_description: Cracked windshield and dented front bumper as captured in the provided photos.

messages.content: {"claim_id":"C67890","status":"Received","submission_timestamp":"2025-12-07T14:32:10Z"}

Your corrected claim has been submitted successfully. **New Claim ID:** C67890
**Status:** Received (pending review).

I’ve also flagged the original claim C12345 for cancellation with the insurer’s support team. You should receive a confirmation email within the next 24‑48 hours.

Is there anything else I can help you with today?
That's all, thanks!
You’re welcome! If you need anything else, just let me know. Have a great day!
